DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate progression ET child ( age 6-17years inclusive ) period 5 year maximum . The study also assess child diagnose , treatment option child symptom event related ET outcomes treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Pediatric Disease Registry Essential Thrombocythaemia ( ET )
DOC.criteria: 6 year less 18 year patient ET accord WHO criteria guidance Interventional clinical study participation
